metadata.name: Renamed Plink Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a renamed version of the Plink binary

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('plink') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -l forward')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -r ')) AND NOT endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\plink.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a renamed version of the Plink binary
